entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient() is popping up a challenge for the system keychain on MacOS #99335
  • GetHostAddresses() on MacOS #99333
  • Can't use UIAutomationClient from console project manually referencing UIAutomationClient.dll #99310
  • [API Proposal]: A built-in collection for weak references #99308
  • Possible memory leak in .Net 8.0.2 #99304
  • [cdac] Implement `!PrintException` #99302
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Enable the DAC to delegate operations to the cDAC #99301
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement basic data stream reader and writer in C #99300
    9.0.0
  • [cdac] Publish data stream spec #99299
    9.0.0
  • Portable Data Contract-based DAC in .NET 9 #99298
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Wrong directory outputed for publish #99292
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ParamCollectionAttribute #99285
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt][wbt] `Wasm.Build.Tests.BlazorWasmTestBase.BlazorRunTest` Current count: 0 #99283
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions in System.Linq.Tests.Perf_Enumerable 2/28/2024 9:23:39 AM #99318
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regression ObjectStringIsString #99314
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 48 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99315
  • SmtpClient SendAsync Fails to send emails even thought it doesn't error #99276
  • EventAttribute Message not showing in ETW events #99274
  • Wasm SignalRClientTests timing out #99268

Closed

  • Internal CLR error in System.Reflection.FieldAccessor.GetValue #98998
    9.0.0
  • The Nuget package for System.Text.Encodings.Web v4.7.2 has the strong name of 4.0.5.1 #99326
  • [JITstressregs]: System.Numerics.Tensors tests SingleGenericTensorPrimitives and DoubleGenericTensorPrimitives failing #98718
    9.0.0
  • Stopping blazor debug session takes too long because of Script Document Node on Solution Explorer #98932
    9.0.0
  • Build failing with `WaitSubsystem.Unix.cs(347,26): error CA2265: Comparing a span to 'null' might be redundant, the 'null' literal will be implicitly converted to a 'Span<T>.Empty' ` #99330
  • [browser][MT] Assert failed: Cannot find Promise for JSHandle -2 #98406
    9.0.0
  • [System.Private.CoreLib] Compilation error: Comparing a span to 'null' might be redundant #99320
  • API change: remove StringBuilder.AppendLine (IFormatProvider ... #99307
  • JsonElement.GetInt32() fails when working with JsonElement directly #99229
  • Configure the certificate valiation from the environment variable #99217
    9.0.0
  • Interop.0.1 failing on gcstress pipeline #99001
    9.0.0
  • C# program stops at wrong line after IndexOutOfRangeException #97175
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 2 Regressions on 2/5/2024 11:10:25 AM #98175
    9.0.0
  • In a blazor wasm component, CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo("tr-TR").DateTimeFormat.DayNames returns not the Turkish names, but English day names #97252
    9.0.0
  • `HttpWebRequest.AllowWriteStreamBuffering` seems to lack an implementation #60993
    Future
  • Localization issue with dates in Basque (eu-ES) in Blazor .NET 8 #99222
  • The error interaction between `String.EndsWith` and `\u0001` in .NET 8 #99279
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #88305
    9.0.0
  • Issue when creating and debugging self-contained single file #42927
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_63942/Runtime_63942/Runtime_63942.cmd #98971
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs test Decrypt_512_CekDoesNotDecrypt_FixedValue fails on Fedora 38 #95115
    9.0.0
  • GC stackwalking crashing on calli with generics #99253
    9.0.0
  • Warn when comparing spans to null #84265
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][wasm] Enable AOT driver mode on wasm on windows. #99334
    area-Build-mono
  • Skip EventPipe cleanup on mono unless runtime is shutting down #99332
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Fix doc comments #99331
    needs-area-label
  • Fix build break #99328
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Update branding to 8.0.4 #99324
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.18 #99323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.29 #99322
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][interp] Super instrution tweaks #99319
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Simplify Environment.FailFast QCALL #99316
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Guarantee that initReg won't be a callee-saved register #99313
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Small clean up in assertprop (casts) #99311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixed: null reference instead of assert on failed reflection in CookieExtensions #99309
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Fixed: potential null reference in XmlTreeGen when DataSet not defined #99306
    area-System.Data
  • [mt][browser] `SignalRClientTests` avoid timeouts on Windows #99303
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [browser][MT] fix nested synchronous JS interop call detection #99296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fixed: potential AV in MethodTableBuilder::FindDeclMethodOnClassInHie… #99295
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Support frozen structs for Swift pinvokes #99294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] OSR: Fix calculating remainingSPSize in genPopCalleeSavedRegisters #99288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Validate some reg homing logic #99286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CC,CD #99284
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Set /DEBUGTYPE:CV,FIXUP on Windows binaries #99282
    area-Build-mono
  • CI test #99281
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [workload-testing] Add properties for nuget.config path, and target t… #99277
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix bugs related to jiterpreter heuristic #99273
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Delete unused System.Runtime.Versioning.CompatibilitySwitch #99270
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Merged

  • Fix race condition in System.Reflection.FieldAccessor #99329
    area-System.Reflection
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Liveness and UpperVector Save/Restore #99093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Schedule mono_wasm_resolve_or_reject_promise continuation to run asynchronously #99317
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove remaining BBJ_COND fallthrough fixups #99271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix build break #99325
    area-System.Threading
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Fix handling of stack adjustments in prolog/epilog #99207
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make vectorizable checks more consistent in TrailingZeroCount operator #99305
    area-System.Numerics
  • SPMI: Remove double minus in perfscore #99312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugproxy] Invoke CDP endpoint to report error to telemetry #99254
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove use of POH for cryptographic primitives #99168
    area-System.Security
  • [mt][browser] Disable `SignalRClientTests` - timing out on Windows #99291
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Remove or document Unsafe.AsPointer uses in tests and miscellaneous code #99272
    needs-area-label
  • Revert "[wasm][workload] Require the workload for wasm threading" #99280
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Set edge likelihood in SetTargetEdge, SetKindAndTargetEdge #99269
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix exception callstack showing incorrect line number #98953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Remove the redundant check of DivideByZeroException for GT_UDIV/GT_UMOD in CodeGen::genCodeForDivMod(). #99215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Remove redundant check for DivideByZeroException for unsigned division/modulo #99228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Skip EventSource tests if process is not elevated #99261
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Enable building cross components from linux-arm64 #99252
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not contain out-of-bounds local addresses #99195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove or document Unsafe.AsPointer uses in core libraries #99146
    area-System.Memory
  • Fix GC stackwalking for generic calli #99257
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Optimize Enumerable.OfType with custom iterator #99216
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_BV_2A #99049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve

Updated

  • Fix extra stack frame on exception stack trace #99263
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move all of our pipelines to use the global-build-job to build CoreCLR, Mono, and Libraries assets #99179
    area-Infrastructure
  • [runtime] Infrastructure to build runtime components using NativeAOT #98565
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Avoid generating linker range extension thunks #99208
    arch-arm32, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() should respect [ActivatorUtilitiesConstructor] #99175
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [browser][MT] Setup tests with blocking .Wait #98802
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove INS_SCALABLE_OPTS_SHIFT #99258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add BP_1A to BQ_2B, BU_2A #99245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Experiment[Draft]- please do not review #99143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Try every ip address on host connection #99204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Memoize some CngKey standard properties #99053
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Test on CI #99042
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix stack walking for new EH #99262
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: inline shared generics with runtime lookups inside #99265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix Promise cancelation race condition #99259
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • ILCompiler: support publishing using a non-portable ILCompiler build. #99148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix switching between single and multi threaded runtimes without clean #98607
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Add support for callee saved XMM registers on Windows x64. #97326
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Use getUnrollThreshold() to get unroll limits #98798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delegate bug fixes #99185
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete stackwalk cache #99137
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Include3rdPartyDLLForSelfExtract for NativeAoT #39202

Closed

  • Code-style analysis rules not included with `AnalysisLevel` = `latest` #37569
  • Update Application-Insights dependency to 2.22 #38513
  • Application.ProductVersion in .NET 8.0.201 returns incorrect value in Windows 11 and c#. #39214

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 8.0.204 #39232

  • Update branding to 6.0.421 #39220

  • Update branding to 6.0.129 #39219

    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • make globalized, AOT apps no longer require nightly #39195

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.315 #39222
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.408 #39223
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.104 #39224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.203 #39225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix SLN structure from src/Tests to test #39226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Application-Insights to 2.22 #38638
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Disable package aliasing tests #39190
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add Install Records for VS Managed Workloads During 'Update' #38346
    Area-Workloads
  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Hide workload update message Fixes #37520 #39185

  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Trim trailing .git from sourcelink repo urls in container generation #39161
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Params Collections #7700

  • [Proposal]: Overload Resolution Priority #7706
  • [Proposal]: Breaking change warnings #7189

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access to primary constructor parameter fails with CS1061 #72411
  • Use QuickAttributes to avoid binding irrelevant method attributes within interceptors namespaces #72410
  • Missing member suggestions object initializer after target-typed constructor in collection expression for array #72400
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: Building a .NET Core Function SDK 8.0.201 on a MAC with M1 chip #72393
  • CompletionService.GetCompletionsAsync NullReferenceException #72389

Closed

  • IntelliSense suggests the `readonly` modifier even when it's already present in the incomplete declaration #72372
    Backlog
  • 'dynamic' keyword alias produces gold bar on typing #72392
  • VB Value Task #72241

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove code for arbitrary diagnostic taggers #72409
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Misc. work for params collections #72408
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • disable crossgen #72407
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove legacy incremental-analyzer implementation of TaskList. part2 #72406
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Setup OptProf profiling for LanguageServer.Protocol #72404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Squeeze down the size of the skeleton reference cache. #72403
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update semantic token refresh queue. #72402
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind extensions in initializers of inferred locals #72398
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Implement SegmentedCollectionsMarshal #72395
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mark two additional features as completed #72387
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged

Merged

  • Don't recommend readonly after readonly #72394
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify api around diagnostic options #72405
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Roslyn non-source-only build fixes #72360
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename IDS_ParamsCollections to IDS_FeatureParamsCollections #72399
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Push latest bits from `main` into roles feature branch #72396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix crash in 'import completion' with alias to non-named type #72401
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Defer array creation in ConcurrentCache. #72291
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce signing parallelism to mitigate OOMs in official builds #72322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Remove the 'Compilation Available' tagger event source #72384
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change CI queues to regular #72391
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge 'main' into ParamsCollections #72390
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update PublishData for VS 17.10P2 snap #72351
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rename a few incorrect IDS_ entries #72385
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10
  • Reduce allocations in InputNodes by specifying initial capacity #72358
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Better BlobBuilder pooling #72383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Attempt at reducing the file I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder. #72377
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Remove legacy incremental-analyzer implementation of TaskList. #72315
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind `allows` constraint clause #72386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Test PR Turn Snippets On #72254
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Reduce closure and Lazy allocations inside CSharpCompilation.ctor #72371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72242
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce allocations required to create a TransformNode #72375
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Delay create the SkeletonReferenceCache #72365
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations under RemoteAssetProvider.SynchronizeAssetsAsync #72229
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate my dotnetcore api will not start when hosted in Azure App Services #54386
  • JSInterop: Handle that rejected JS promises can be any type. #54383
  • Perf regression: mvc, plaintext #54382
  • Perf improvement: single_query #54381
  • Swagger (Get Index.html) fails when reflection-based serialization has been disabled. #54377
  • Blazor JS code refactoring #54375
    9.0-preview4
  • Api return IAsyncEnumerable<> get errors when AddJsonOptions with custom json converter extend from JsonConverter<object> #54374
  • BlazorWebJsInitializersTest don't run #54367
    9.0-preview4
  • .NET 8 WebApi Experiences a TLS Handshake Error when running in a ubi8 FIPS-enabled container #54366
  • Make Blazor WebAssembly work on multithreaded runtime #54365
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Perf improvement: json #54364

Closed

  • IClaimsTransformation do not automagically compose #46120
    AuthPlanning
  • Disposing disposable transient services in Blazor #54376
  • WithOpenAPI Generates Empty requestBody.content #54189
  • Blazor download size regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #53886
    9.0-preview3
  • Perf improvement: json, updates #54327
  • Published site fails to load (Internal Server Error 500) when publishing ASP.NET Core API to SCD. #48941

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `LocationChangingHandlers_CannotCancelTheNavigationAsynchronously_UntilReturning` #54388
    area-blazor
  • Unquarantine `ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCircuit` #54387
    area-blazor
  • Update branding to 8.0.4 #54380
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.18 #54379
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.29 #54378
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit and ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit #54373
    area-blazor
  • http.sys accept loop - mitigate against break due to possible conflicting IO callbacks #54368
    area-networking

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.OpenApi dependency version #54361
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix test CanRenderLargeComponentsWithServerRenderMode #54340
    area-blazor

Updated

  • Fix `MouseOverAndMouseOut_CanTrigger` #54389
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54241
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/6.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #54242
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix dependabot `npm-registry` url #54362
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Blazor web csharp template #51030
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry property TextTransform = TextTransform.None does not work on iOS #21024
  • Mica material causes issues w/ UI tests #21021
  • choppy scrolling with CollectionView #21019
    Backlog
  • Label with Visual State Manager and PointerOver is stuck on Mac Catalyst #21018
    Backlog
  • Rising Memory Consumption leading to crashing App after a while when Utilizing NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset in ObservableRangeCollection #21015
    Backlog
  • dotnet maui xaml not found in creating a xaml file #21014
  • .NET MAUI - OnKeyUp, OnKeyDown, dispatchKeyEvent are not firing when the back button is pressed with the keyboard open. #21013
    Backlog
  • Create test for ShouldShowToolbarButton #21012
    Backlog
  • [Bug][XAML] Using an intermediate base class for a ResourceDictionary fails to load when XamlCompilation enabled #21008
    Backlog
  • Memory raising when using Application.Current.MainPage.Navigation.PushAsync #21007
  • [MAUI][.NET8] Search for a recipe with "fries" first result is not "Alpine fries". #21006
  • Unexpected DataTrigger Behaviour on Android #21004
    Backlog

Closed

  • [MAUI][.NET8] Search for a recipe with "fries" first result is not "Alpine fries". #21005
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI: It is not possible to clear focus from the entry control in Android versions equal to or below 8.1. #21009
  • Set default padding/margin to 0 for picker/switch #21016
  • Trying to create ipa file file but got error from "CreateAssetPack" task during the distribution process #20966
  • [VSCode][MAUI]The Refresh spinner arrow is not displayed centered on iOS target. #17392
  • ShouldShowToolbarButton() override on FlyoutPage not working #15111
  • 無法調試執行偵錯觀看設計介面 #20957
  • Border cannot render to the requested size and instead renders a 1-2 px margin around itself each time (Windows/iOS/Android all affected) #17882
    Backlog
  • Regression Bug. Nested ScrollView does not work in Android. Works in iOS. #20920

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Does nullable reference types enable affect the runtime null checks? #33245
  • EF Core Query Translation Bug: Missing Elements in SQL for Complex GroupBy with Union and Cross Join #33244
  • UnexpectedTrailingResultSetWhenSaving with Temporal Tables and Concurrency Token when updating multiple entity types in context #33243
  • Query/Json: properly wire up key information to the materializer when doing queryable operations on JSON collections in NoTrackingWithIdentityResolution #33242

Closed

  • The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #32972
    8.0.4
  • [8.0.2] OutOfMemoryException when creating migration using ef tool #33176
    8.0.4
  • Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complex types with TPH entities #33004
    8.0.4
  • Does DbContext correctly persist inherited properties from a parent class in another project? #33234
  • Ability to run a sql script on a db context with "dotnet ef" #33240
  • How to include children on another children condition #33217

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Split public pipeline definition #33253
    tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Split public pipeline definition #33252
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Split public pipeline definition #33251
    tell-mode
  • Split public pipeline definition #33250
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #33249
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to 7.0.18 #33247

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #33004 - Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complextypes with TPH entities #33054
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.4
  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Reduce memory usage during relationship cycle detection by keeping track of visited properties whenever there are FK forks #33211
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33048
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.4
  • Update branding to 8.0.4 #33248
  • Update branding to 6.0.29 #33246
  • Fix MemberExpression funcletization #33241

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32911 - Incorrect apply projection for complex properties #33212
    Servicing-consider
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.36.0 to 3.38.1 #33238
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
